summary: A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband.
cast: Jim Belushi|Kylie Travis|Shannon Whirry|Frank Whaley|Jesse Borrego|M. Emmet Walsh|Sherman Howard|Guy Boyd|Kristina Coggins|Robbie Thibaut Jr.|Roger Clinton
keywords: time travel|alternate timeline|crime of passion|race against time|rampage
title: Retroactive
